APPLE_RELEASE_LIB(${SDLIMAGE}/${OS}/lib/Release/SDL_image.a)

### COMPILE ###
DKSETPATH(${SDLIMAGE}/${OS})
WIN32_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A Win32 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__FLTUSED__" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DSDL2_DIR=${SDL} -DSDL2_INCLUDE_DIR=${SDL}/include -DSDL2_LIBRARY=${SDL}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/zlibstatic.lib -DTIFF_INCLUDE_DIR=${TIFF}/libtiff -DTIFF_INCLUDE_DIR2=${TIFF}/win32 -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR=${PNG} -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${PNG}/win32 -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR=${JPEG} -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${JPEG}/win32 -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR=${GIF} -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR2=${GIF}/win32 -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_WEBP=OFF -DPNG_SHARED=OFF -DPNG_TESTS=OFF -DWIN_32=ON ${SDLIMAGE})
WIN32_VS_DEBUG(SDL2_image-2.0.1 SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)
WIN32_VS_RELEASE(SDL2_image-2.0.1 SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)

DKSETPATH(${SDLIMAGE}/${OS})
WIN64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G ${GENERATOR} -A x64 "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS=/DWIN32 /D_WINDOWS /W3 /nologo /D__FLTUSED__" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_DEBUG=/MTd /Od /Ob0 /Zi /RTC1 /DDEBUG /D_DEBUG" "-DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_RELEASE=/MT /O2 /Ob2 /DNDEBUG" -DSDL2_DIR=${SDL} -DSDL2_INCLUDE_DIR=${SDL}/include -DSDL2_LIBRARY=${SDL}/${OS}/Release/SDL2.lib -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/zlibstatic.lib -DTIFF_INCLUDE_DIR=${TIFF}/libtiff -DTIFF_INCLUDE_DIR2=${TIFF}/win64 -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR=${PNG} -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${PNG}/win64 -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR=${JPEG} -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${JPEG}/win64 -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR=${GIF} -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR2=${GIF}/win64 -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_WEBP=OFF -DPNG_SHARED=OFF -DPNG_TESTS=OFF -DWIN_64=ON ${SDLIMAGE})
WIN64_VS_DEBUG(SDL2_image-2.0.1 SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)
WIN64_VS_RELEASE(SDL2_image-2.0.1 SDLIMAGE.sln SDLIMAGE)

DKSETPATH(${SDLIMAGE}/${OS})
MAC64_COMMAND(${CMAKE_COMMAND} -G "Xcode" -DCMAKE_OSX_ARCHITECTURES=x86_64 -DSDL2_DIR=${SDL} -DSDL2_INCLUDE_DIR=${SDL}/include -DSDL2_LIBRARY=${SDL}/${OS}/Release/libSDL2.a -DZLIB_INCLUDE_DIR=${ZLIB} -DZLIB_LIBRARY=${ZLIB}/${OS}/Release/libz.a -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR=${PNG} -DPNG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${PNG}/mac64 -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR=${JPEG} -DJPEG_INCLUDE_DIR2=${JPEG}/mac64 -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR=${GIF} -DGIF_INCLUDE_DIR2=${GIF}/mac64 -DSDLIMAGE_SUPPORT_WEBP=OFF -DPNG_SHARED=OFF -DPNG_TESTS=OFF -DMAC_64=ON ${SDLIMAGE})
